description:
Have you ever wanted to start your own online store or eCommerce business?

Do you want to learn how to sell on Amazon?

Do you want to set up a semipassive income stream?

If you said yes, then this course is for you.

This course is for anyone looking to learn how to use Amazon FBA and wanting to get started selling on Amazon. .

Taught by two experts with 15 years online selling experience, using screenshots, slide shows, and videos tutorials, we will teach you:

  • what Amazon has to offer for 3rd party sellers
  • the difference between Fulfillment By Amazon and Merchant Fulfillment
  • which type of seller account to choose
  • what is retail sourcing and how to start
  • explain bundles and how they work
  • how to maximize your profits in categories like Groceries and HBA
  • the importance of sales rank and the role it plays in choosing inventory
  • what is online sourcing
  • how to use a wholesaler and where to find them
  • how to use the Amazon Seller app
  • how to save money when sourcing inventory
  • what categories you can sell in
  • what activities will get you banned
  • common jargon used in the Amazon seller communities

In this 2 hour course, with over 60 minutes of sourcing videos, you will become an expert in retail and online sourcing and have the skills to turn Amazon into a part time or full time income.

This is not another "get rich quick" scheme or "Make x amount' in a month class, this is an in-depth, living, breathing course. Taught by two real people who are continuously updating and adding new sections, insuring that you are always staying current on today's best practices.

If you been dreaming about becoming your own boss, we challenge you start the journey today. Start here. Start now.
title: The Complete Business Tutorial to Using Amazon FBA
